Name: Eager Construct
Oracle Text: When this creature enters, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom.)

Name: Night Market Guard
Oracle Text: This creature can block an additional creature each combat.

Name: Regna's Sanction
Oracle Text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend puts a +1/+1 counter on each creature they control. Each foe chooses one untapped creature they control, then taps the rest.

Name: Zndrsplt's Judgment
Oracle Text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend creates a token that's a copy of a creature they control. Each foe returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.

Name: Virtus's Maneuver
Oracle Text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend returns a creature card from their graveyard to their hand. Each foe sacrifices a creature of their choice.

Name: Khorvath's Fury
Oracle Text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend discards all cards from their hand, then draws that many cards plus one. Khorvath's Fury deals damage to each foe equal to the number of cards in their hand.

Name: Pir's Whim
Oracle Text: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend searches their library for a land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles. Each foe sacrifices an artifact or enchantment of their choice.
